tool.name: SAGA.garden_learn_to_program.6
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayELEVATION False output_data_AREA $output_data_AREA output_data_LENGTH $output_data_LENGTH name SAGA.garden_learn_to_program.6 ELEVATION $ELEVATION STEP $STEP METHOD $METHOD ONECELL $ONECELL XCELL $XCELL YCELL $YCELL prefer $prefer response $response outputType_AREA $OutputSection_AREA.outputType_AREA transmissionMode_AREA $OutputSection_AREA.transmissionMode_AREA outputType_LENGTH $OutputSection_LENGTH.outputType_LENGTH transmissionMode_LENGTH $OutputSection_LENGTH.transmissionMode_LENGTH

param.name: ELEVATION
param.label: Elevation grid
param.help: This must be your input data of type grid. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: METHOD
param.label: Method
param.option: Needs less memory, but is slow
Needs more memory, but is quicker

param.name: ONECELL
param.label: Single Cell
param.help: Set 'false' to execute the calculation for each point in grid. Set 'true' tu calculate the flow of one single cell.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_AREA
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_AREA
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_LENGTH
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_LENGTH
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Extended Neighbourhoods - Catchment areas.<br/>(c) 2003 by Olaf Conrad, Goettingen<br/>email: oconrad@gwdg.de
